### getFilename() {#ab5eafaf67b9a450116b00366916c375b}

<MemberDefinition

  labels = {["static"]}>
Extract a filename for a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/disubprogram">DISubprogram</a>.

Prefer relative paths in the coverage notes. Clang also may split up absolute paths into a directory and filename component. When the relative path doesn&#39;t exist, reconstruct the absolute path.

<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A function has a unique identifier, a checksum (we leave as zero) and a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// set of blocks and a map of edges between blocks. This is the only GCOV</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// object users can construct, the blocks and lines will be rooted here.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1221"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To simplify code, we cap the number of file infos we write out to fit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1222"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// easily in a 32-bit signed integer. This gives consistent behavior between</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 32-bit and 64-bit systems without requiring (potentially very slow) 64-bit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1224"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// operations on 32-bit systems. It also seems unreasonable to try to handle</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1225"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// more than 2 billion files.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1226"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((int64&#95;t)FileInfos.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() &gt; (int64&#95;t)INT&#95;MAX)</span></CodeLine>
